Description: This mod allows for the customization of all music and sounds of the game. Join <color=blue>https://discord.gg/ht8ttc3R8E</color> for a explanation on how soundpacks work.

TextInputSettings.Name: Selected Soundpack
TextInputSettings.Description: The soundpack you are going to listen to.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Randomize Soundpacks
CheckboxSettings.Description: At the start of a game, the selected soundpack will be randomized. This will change the Selected Soundpack text input box too to the one chosen at random.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Looping Rapid Mode
CheckboxSettings.Description: Allows for the file RapidModeLooping to be in a constant loop while game is in rapid mode.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Deactivate Custom SFX
CheckboxSettings.Description: Only the music will be customized, sounds will be base game's. If you get lag spikes because of the mod, try turning this on.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Deactivate Custom Triggers
CheckboxSettings.Description: Disables soundpacks to have specific music when a specific trigger in-game happens(such as being a role, day 1, etc)

CheckboxSettings.Name: Allow Custom Triggers SFX
CheckboxSettings.Description: Soundpacks are able to modify steps and UI sounds when a folder trigger occurs. <color=yellow>WARNING: this WILL cause major lag spikes if your pc is not high-end.</color>
